key.name: type
key.description: Determines the background type. Possible values are "color", "wallpaper".

key.name: primary-color
key.description: Left or Top color when draring gradients, or the solid color.

key.name: secondary-color
key.description: Right or Bottom color when draring gradients, not used for solid color.

key.name: color-shading-type
key.description: How to shade the background color. Possible values are "solid", "horizontal" or "vertical".

key.name: wallpaper-uri
key.description: URI to use for the background wallpaper.
